title: Another Dream
description: Out of print, but a new edition of this story, completely rewritten from the ground up, and titled "Dreams Are for Real," will be coming soon in the Dream On series.When a shy, virgin erotica writer with a tool belt fetish crosses paths with an outgoing carpenter, the fireworks soar. Introverted Larry has an active imagination, and Marty is just the man to draw him out of his shell. When circumstances send the boys on a road trip together, they start to get to know each other, and they like what they see. The problem is that Larry worries about the motivation behind his feelings, while Marty's tired of the single life. He's ready to settle down and has been looking for Mr. Right. Will opposites attract and make their dreams come true, or will Larry's insecurities keep him from seizing love?
author: Addison Albright
